title: David Sedaris Answered 175 Fan Letters While Stuck At Home With Covid
description:
The hilarious David Sedaris stops by to introduce his latest book and share what he did to pass the time while recovering from his recent bout with Covid. David’s new book, “Happy-Go-Lucky,” is available everywhere now!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
